title: Targeted by U.S. Ally, an Arab Dissident Vanished Across Borders
description: After criticizing the United Arab Emirates on social media, an Egyptian activist was extradited to the Gulf country, where he has been detained without trial for months.
body: After criticizing the United Arab Emirates on social media, an Egyptian activist was extradited to the Gulf country, where he has been detained without trial for months.

title: The Deadly Risks of Reporting in Gaza
description: Journalists endure the same harrowing reality as other Gazans: hunger and the constant threat of death. Those challenges risk further stifling what the world hears about the war.
body: Journalists endure the same harrowing reality as other Gazans: hunger and the constant threat of death. Those challenges risk further stifling what the world hears about the war.

title: Denmark Summons U.S. Envoy Over Espionage Allegations
description: It’s the latest twist in the Greenland drama. President Trump wants the island, but Denmark refuses to hand it over.
body: It’s the latest twist in the Greenland drama. President Trump wants the island, but Denmark refuses to hand it over.

title: Germany Proposes Plan to Boost Recruitment or Resort to Draft
description: Some detractors think the new bill is too weak to fill the recruitment gap. Others worry it will inevitably lead to forced conscription.
body: Some detractors think the new bill is too weak to fill the recruitment gap. Others worry it will inevitably lead to forced conscription.

title: El Salvador Enacts Military-Style Rules on Haircuts and More in Schools
description: President Nayib Bukele says that his new education minister, a military officer, will restore discipline to schools where gangs once recruited. A school workers’ union called the appointment “absurd.”
body: President Nayib Bukele says that his new education minister, a military officer, will restore discipline to schools where gangs once recruited. A school workers’ union called the appointment “absurd.”

title: Late-Night Killing of a Teenage Girl on a Bicycle Unnerves Amsterdam
description: A 17-year-old was stabbed to death as she rode home after a night out. Her killing has shaken a city where cycling safely at any hour is taken for granted.
body: A 17-year-old was stabbed to death as she rode home after a night out. Her killing has shaken a city where cycling safely at any hour is taken for granted.

title: Bungling Arsonists, Antisemitic Attacks and a Diplomatic Rift
description: Australia has accused Iran of directing an attack on a Jewish restaurant in Sydney through a web of intermediaries. The operation on the ground, court records suggest, was messy.
body: Australia has accused Iran of directing an attack on a Jewish restaurant in Sydney through a web of intermediaries. The operation on the ground, court records suggest, was messy.
